H0.text: Which New York airport was re-named after late President John F Kennedy. LaGuardia Airport

H1.text: Which New York airport was re-named after late President John F Kennedy. Newark Liberty International Airport

H2.text: Which New York airport was re-named after late President John F Kennedy. Stewart International Airport

H3.text: Which New York airport was re-named after late President John F Kennedy. Kjfk

A4.text: Following the assassination of John F. Kennedy in 1963, the airport was renamed John F. Kennedy International Airport in tribute to him.
